casebody.data:
DARRYL W.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 21, 2017 Craig A. Sullivan, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Darryl W.'s petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 454 , 172 A.3d 853 (2017), is denied.
